Master Answer:
Most pharmacies have the influenza (flu) vaccine and are open weekends and evenings. We recommend contacting your local pharmacy for information on flu vaccine availability. If you are having difficulty locating a flu clinic near you using our influenza (flu) clinic locator, you can also contact your local health unit for information on flu clinics in your area. You can find the contact information for your local health unit here. 
Immunization Nurse
